attribute.name: TAU Runtime.performance.options.environmentvariables.configuration_id_TAU_THROTTLE_PERCALL
attribute.rm:description: Runtime throttling per call threshold (e.g. less than 10 microseconds per call)
attribute.rm:tooltip: Runtime throttling per call threshold (e.g. less than 10 microseconds per call)

attribute.name: TAU Runtime.performance.options.environmentvariables.configuration_id_TAU_THROTTLE_NUMCALLS
attribute.rm:description: Runtime throttling number of calls threshold (e.g. at least 100000 calls)
attribute.rm:tooltip: Runtime throttling number of calls threshold (e.g. at least 100000 calls)

attribute.name: TAU Runtime.performance.options.environmentvariables.configuration_id_TAU_PROFILE_FORMAT
attribute.rm:description: Format of profile output. Note that merged output may prevent automatic database uploads.

attribute.name: Tau Compiler.performance.options.configuration_id_-OPTDETECTMEMORYLEAKS_ARGUMENT_DEFAULT
attribute.rm:description: Track mallocs/frees using TAU's memory wrapper
attribute.rm:tooltip: Track mallocs/frees using TAU's memory wrapper

rm:widget.title: Upload profile data to TAU Portal
